text: Devil May Cry is the first video game in the series of Devil May Cry. It was released on the PlayStation 2 on 2001. ==Gameplay== Dante can use a melee weapon or a firearm towards enemies. He can collect blue orbs and purple orbs to upgrade his health and Devil Trigger meters. ==Plot== Sparda, a demon had a half-demon son named Dante. Dante now takes care of a shop called Devil May Cry. ==Development== The game started as a 1999 prototype for Resident Evil 4 but it got revamped after it was considered a game that isn't a part of Resident Evil. ==Reception== The game was well-liked despite it's hard difficulty.
